pkgmetadata.longdescription: From Time Series to Networks // Transforming one or multiple time series into networks. This package is useful for complex systems modeling, time series data mining, or time series analysis using networks. An introduction to the topic and the descriptions of the methods implemented in this package can be found in Mitchell (2006) doi:10.1016/j.artint.2006.10.002, Silva and Zhao (2016) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-17290-3, and Silva et al. (2021) doi:10.1002/widm.1404.
